titleStmt.title: An exact description of Prince Ruperts malignant she-monkey, a great delinquent: Having approved her selfe a better servant, then his white dog called Boy. Laid open in three particulars: 1. What she is in her owne shape. 2. What she doth figuratively signifie. 3. Her malignant tricks and qualities.
titleStmt.author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653, attributed author.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Taylor in the Wrenn catalogue.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
